source:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_00Mayaru Moyaru looks eager to regale you about all there is to know of the latest Moonfire Faire.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_00Mayaru Moyaru looks eager to regale you about all there is to know of the latest Moonfire Faire.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

source:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_01Noticing the sweat on your brow from the summer heat, Mayaru Moyaru motions you to visit Costa del Sol so you can cool down by taking a dip in its serene waters. He implores you to enjoy the Moonfire Faire festivities while you are there, and mentions the return of a mysterious attraction. To learn more, it seems you must speak with his colleague, Haermaga, in the seaside resort.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_01Noticing the sweat on your brow from the summer heat, Mayaru Moyaru motions you to visit Costa del Sol so you can cool down by taking a dip in its serene waters. He implores you to enjoy the Moonfire Faire festivities while you are there, and mentions the return of a mysterious attraction. To learn more, it seems you must speak with his colleague, Haermaga, in the seaside resort.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_02<tab>Haermaga quickly reveals to you that the mysterious returning attraction is none other than the Eorzean Nimble Warrior courseーalbeit reborn. He mentions that he has a request he wants to make of you, if you are willing to help. Speak with him again to accept his request.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_02<tab>Haermaga quickly reveals to you that the mysterious returning attraction is none other than the Eorzean Nimble Warrior courseーalbeit reborn. He mentions that he has a request he wants to make of you, if you are willing to help. Speak with him again to accept his request.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_03<tab>Haermaga's request concerns R'fhul Tia, whom he feels has let his early success get to his head. He wants you to act as a guiding star for the young adventurer, and set him back upon the right path. To do so, you will first need to speak with R'fhul Tia.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_03<tab>Haermaga's request concerns R'fhul Tia, whom he feels has let his early success get to his head. He wants you to act as a guiding star for the young adventurer, and set him back upon the right path. To do so, you will first need to speak with R'fhul Tia.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_04<tab>Both of R'fhul Tia's followers introduced themselves to you at his behest. Though he seems quite confident he will succeed in his attempt through the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course, you notice that the two of them and R'majha are worried about him. Proceed to the destination to watch how he performs.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_04<tab>Both of R'fhul Tia's followers introduced themselves to you at his behest. Though he seems quite confident he will succeed in his attempt through the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course, you notice that the two of them and R'majha are worried about him. Proceed to the destination to watch how he performs.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_05<tab>R'fhul Tia's attempt ended in failure. After such a fall, he is in dire need of help. Render him aid with all haste.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_05<tab>R'fhul Tia's attempt ended in failure. After such a fall, he is in dire need of help. Render him aid with all haste.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_06<tab>R'fhul Tia's followers did not mince words in expressing their disappointment with him, and shortly thereafter took their leave. He cannot seem to understand what he did wrong, but fortunately for him, he still has you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_06<tab>R'fhul Tia's followers did not mince words in expressing their disappointment with him, and shortly thereafter took their leave. He cannot seem to understand what he did wrong, but fortunately for him, he still has you.

target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Haermaga in Costa del Sol.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_000<tab>Ah, hello, hello! Just the adventurer I was looking for. Feelin' the heat? Well, nothing like a good swim in Costa del Sol to cool downーand while you're there, you might as well enjoy the Moonfire festivities!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_000<tab>Ah, hello, hello! Just the adventurer I was looking for. Feelin' the heat? Well, nothing like a good swim in Costa del Sol to cool downーand while you're there, you might as well enjoy the Moonfire festivities!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_001<tab>Hello there! You look to me like an adventurer who can enjoy a good festival when they see one. And if I may say so myself, the Moonfire Faire is the finest of 'em in all of Eorzea!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_001<tab>Hello there! You look to me like an adventurer who can enjoy a good festival when they see one. And if I may say so myself, the Moonfire Faire is the finest of 'em in all of Eorzea!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_002<tab>The faire has served to promote the Adventurer's Guild in recent years. I expect plenty of folks'll join the fun this year as well, as no one will want to miss the exciting show we're putting on.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_002<tab>The faire has served to promote the Adventurer's Guild in recent years. I expect plenty of folks'll join the fun this year as well, as no one will want to miss the exciting show we're putting on.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_003<tab>That's rightーdue to popular demand and the wishes of Master Gegeruju himself, we brought <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> back!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_003<tab>That's rightーdue to popular demand and the wishes of Master Gegeruju himself, we brought <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> back!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_004<tab>Intrigued, aren't you? Sate your curiousity by speaking with Haermaga in Costa del Sol!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_004<tab>Intrigued, aren't you? Sate your curiousity by speaking with Haermaga in Costa del Sol!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_005<tab>Look for Haermaga on the Isle of Endless Summer at Costa del Sol. He can tell you everything you need to know!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_005<tab>Look for Haermaga on the Isle of Endless Summer at Costa del Sol. He can tell you everything you need to know!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, here at last! You're here to give <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> a whirl, aren't ya? That hulking monstrosity erected upon the shore...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, here at last! You're here to give <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> a whirl, aren't ya? That hulking monstrosity erected upon the shore...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_011<tab>Welcome to the Moonfire Faire, fair adventurer! You're here to give <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> a whirl, aren't ya? That hulking monstrosity erected upon the shore...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_011<tab>Welcome to the Moonfire Faire, fair adventurer! You're here to give <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> a whirl, aren't ya? That hulking monstrosity erected upon the shore...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>That imposing fortress that turns grown men into weeping babes, that crucible which forges the fiercest of warriors or spits out their mangled remainsーaye, the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>That imposing fortress that turns grown men into weeping babes, that crucible which forges the fiercest of warriors or spits out their mangled remainsーaye, the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_012<tab>We've had some issues here and there which prevented us from constructing the course anew for a time, but we made it work this year to satisfy the fierce demand from our patrons.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_012<tab>We've had some issues here and there which prevented us from constructing the course anew for a time, but we made it work this year to satisfy the fierce demand from our patrons.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_013<tab>But it hasn't merely returnedーoh no, it's been updated, refined and I daresay it's a course...reborn!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_013<tab>But it hasn't merely returnedーoh no, it's been updated, refined and I daresay it's a course...reborn!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_014<tab>While the newly available circuit is not physically demanding, it is no less a spectacle. We recruited the finest Gold Saucer technicians and a certain bomb expert to craft a veritable mother lode of bombs into the new attraction!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_014<tab>While the newly available circuit is not physically demanding, it is no less a spectacle. We recruited the finest Gold Saucer technicians and a certain bomb expert to craft a veritable mother lode of bombs into the new attraction!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_015<tab>'Tis a trial that tests the resolve of fledgling and experienced adventurers alike, as all shall be forced to not only calculate the timing of the impending explosions, but avoid the shockwaves that follow them too. If you think you're up to the task, then by all means, show everyone watching how it's done!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_015<tab>'Tis a trial that tests the resolve of fledgling and experienced adventurers alike, as all shall be forced to not only calculate the timing of the impending explosions, but avoid the shockwaves that follow them too. If you think you're up to the task, then by all means, show everyone watching how it's done!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_015<tab>Heh, you look eager to give it a whirl despite all the risks. And yet I don't get the sense that you're underestimating the challenge before you either... <sigh> It would do the young lad good to see the temperament of a pro like yourself, would that he could learn from your example.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_015<tab>Heh, you look eager to give it a whirl despite all the risks. And yet I don't get the sense that you're underestimating the challenge before you either... <sigh> It would do the young lad good to see the temperament of a pro like yourself, would that he could learn from your example.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_016<tab>Ah, seeing the course in all its newfound glory got me reminiscing about a certain adventurer who once braved it. What to do about him...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_016<tab>Ah, seeing the course in all its newfound glory got me reminiscing about a certain adventurer who once braved it. What to do about him...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_016<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_016<tab>Hmph.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_017<tab>Hey, you wouldn't mind lending me a hand with something, would ya? When you're not busy running the course, naturally. Give me a shout after this if you're interested.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_017<tab>Hey, you wouldn't mind lending me a hand with something, would ya? When you're not busy running the course, naturally. Give me a shout after this if you're interested.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_020<tab>You'll lend a hand then? You have my gratitude. The matter in question is in regards to a certain new...ah, I suppose he isn't new anymore. Well, anyway, I want you to act as a model of sorts for a certain young adventurer.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_020<tab>You'll lend a hand then? You have my gratitude. The matter in question is in regards to a certain new...ah, I suppose he isn't new anymore. Well, anyway, I want you to act as a model of sorts for a certain young adventurer.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_021<tab>He's no stranger to you of courseーrecall a fella by the name of R'fhul Tia? Came to the Moonfire Faire with his lil sis R'mahja before, remember? The lad went and became an adventurer, and seems to have some experience under his belt now, but...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_021<tab>He's no stranger to you of courseーrecall a fella by the name of R'fhul Tia? Came to the Moonfire Faire with his lil sis R'mahja before, remember? The lad went and became an adventurer, and seems to have some experience under his belt now, but...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_022<tab>The lad's name is R'fhul Tia. Comes to the Moonfire Faire regularly with his lil sis R'mahja, and seems to be a well-meanin' fella for the most part. Recently, though...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_022<tab>The lad's name is R'fhul Tia. Comes to the Moonfire Faire regularly with his lil sis R'mahja, and seems to be a well-meanin' fella for the most part. Recently, though...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_023<tab>Well, to put it simply, he's puttin' on airs. You'd better see him for yourself to get the real picture. I saw him heading to the north of the island with his sister earlierーyou should be able to find him there.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_023<tab>Well, to put it simply, he's puttin' on airs. You'd better see him for yourself to get the real picture. I saw him heading to the north of the island with his sister earlierーyou should be able to find him there.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_024<tab>While he has his issues, there's no doubt in my mind that he has a promising future as an adventurer. I'll leave it up to you to decide how you want to go about it, but guide him back to the right path, would ya?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_024<tab>While he has his issues, there's no doubt in my mind that he has a promising future as an adventurer. I'll leave it up to you to decide how you want to go about it, but guide him back to the right path, would ya?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_025<tab>R'fhul Tia should be in the northern region of the island. How you go about it is up to youーjust guide him back to the right path.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_025<tab>R'fhul Tia should be in the northern region of the island. How you go about it is up to youーjust guide him back to the right path.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_026<tab>I begged my brother to bring me to the Moonfire Faire again this year, I just love it sooo much! And its even more fun because he's with me!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_026<tab>I begged my brother to bring me to the Moonfire Faire again this year, I just love it sooo much! And its even more fun because he's with me!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_027<tab>W-Wait a minute, you're...I can't believe this, you're like one of my heroes!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_027<tab>W-Wait a minute, you're...I can't believe this, you're like one of my heroes!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_028<tab>Well, this is a pleasant surprise. Our mentor predicted you would join the festivities.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_028<tab>Well, this is a pleasant surprise. Our mentor predicted you would join the festivities.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_030<tab>Long time no see, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I had a feeling we'd meet again. Don't be shy now, Majha, say hello!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_030<tab>Long time no see, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I had a feeling we'd meet again. Don't be shy now, Majha, say hello!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_031<tab>Hi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm so happy I could meet you again! We're gonna have so much fun today!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_031<tab>Hi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm so happy I could meet you again! We're gonna have so much fun today!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_032<tab>Ah, might you be  <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I'm so happy I could finally meet you, I could nearly cry...! O-Oh right, this right here is my little sister!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_032<tab>Ah, might you be  <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I'm so happy I could finally meet you, I could nearly cry...! O-Oh right, this right here is my little sister!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_033<tab>Pleased to meet you, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> Adventurer! My name is R'majha! Will you be playing with us today?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_033<tab>Pleased to meet you, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> Adventurer! My name is R'majha! Will you be playing with us today?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_034<tab>There's been something I want to tell you, if I ever got the chance...I've graduated from being a mere novice adventurer. Hells, I even have followers now!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_034<tab>There's been something I want to tell you, if I ever got the chance...I've graduated from being a mere novice adventurer. Hells, I even have followers now!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_100_034<tab>Though, I suppose this is a rather natural trajectory for someone of my obvious talent.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_100_034<tab>Though, I suppose this is a rather natural trajectory for someone of my obvious talent.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_035<tab>Now, pray allow my precious followers to introduce themselves.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_035<tab>Now, pray allow my precious followers to introduce themselves.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_036<tab>The mentor I respect respects you, so if you really think about it, I must respect you too! And somebody that commands such respect must be incredible, eh? It's an honor <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, truly!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_036<tab>The mentor I respect respects you, so if you really think about it, I must respect you too! And somebody that commands such respect must be incredible, eh? It's an honor <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, truly!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_037<tab>Heh...I've been hearing all kinds of amazing rumors about you for some time now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It's a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_037<tab>Heh...I've been hearing all kinds of amazing rumors about you for some time now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It's a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_038<tab>So, I take it you also heard the rumors about <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> and decided to join in the festivities, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_038<tab>So, I take it you also heard the rumors about <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> and decided to join in the festivities, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_100_038<tab>I can't lie, I'm itchin' to give the ol' course a go! I hear they've even added a new bombastic circuit to it, but for a prodigy like me who completed it as a novice...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_100_038<tab>I can't lie, I'm itchin' to give the ol' course a go! I hear they've even added a new bombastic circuit to it, but for a prodigy like me who completed it as a novice...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_039<tab>The real challenge'll be not to fall asleep from boredom. Can't afford to make any unseemly mistakes as a rising star, after all!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_039<tab>The real challenge'll be not to fall asleep from boredom. Can't afford to make any unseemly mistakes as a rising star, after all!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_001<tab>Break a leg.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_001<tab>Break a leg.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_002<tab>You could try, you know, not being cocky as well?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_002<tab>You could try, you know, not being cocky as well?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_003<tab>...You've completed the course before?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_003<tab>...You've completed the course before?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_040<tab>Heh, I appreciate your support, but it is quite unnecessary. I'll put on a dazzling performance as I overcome it regardless.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_040<tab>Heh, I appreciate your support, but it is quite unnecessary. I'll put on a dazzling performance as I overcome it regardless.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_041<tab>Still, it's an honor to receive encouragement from the person I look up to. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_041<tab>Still, it's an honor to receive encouragement from the person I look up to. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_042<tab>Nonsense, I'm being confident, not cocky! It just came out naturallyーI guess this is what happens when you become a respectable adventurer, eh?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_042<tab>Nonsense, I'm being confident, not cocky! It just came out naturallyーI guess this is what happens when you become a respectable adventurer, eh?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_043<tab>Watch me out there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll show you just how far I've come when I tear through that course!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_043<tab>Watch me out there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll show you just how far I've come when I tear through that course!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_044<tab>Wh-What are you s-saying, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! And in front of my impressionable followers no less! You should be well aware of my historic achievement!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_044<tab>Wh-What are you s-saying, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! And in front of my impressionable followers no less! You should be well aware of my historic achievement!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_045<tab>Make no mistake, I've completed the course. The old me who made one blunder after another is gone. You'll see, just watch!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_045<tab>Make no mistake, I've completed the course. The old me who made one blunder after another is gone. You'll see, just watch!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_046<tab>Are you sure you're okay, Fhul? You've been acting weird lately...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_046<tab>Are you sure you're okay, Fhul? You've been acting weird lately...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_047<tab>Am I okay? Hah! I'm better than ever. Don't you worry one bit, Mahjaーyour big bro's a fully-fledged adventurer now.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_047<tab>Am I okay? Hah! I'm better than ever. Don't you worry one bit, Mahjaーyour big bro's a fully-fledged adventurer now.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_FHULTIA_000_048<tab>From the moment I became an adventurer, I've always looked up to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There's no one I want watching me accomplish my finest achievement more than you. If you can spare a moment to watch, please wait near the starting line. Hope to see you there!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_FHULTIA_000_048<tab>From the moment I became an adventurer, I've always looked up to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There's no one I want watching me accomplish my finest achievement more than you. If you can spare a moment to watch, please wait near the starting line. Hope to see you there!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_049<tab>Fhul...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_049<tab>Fhul...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_050<tab>It'll be okay, Majha. It's your brother after all. He'll pull through, surely...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_050<tab>It'll be okay, Majha. It's your brother after all. He'll pull through, surely...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_051<tab>Yes, you most likely have nothing to worry about, my dear...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_051<tab>Yes, you most likely have nothing to worry about, my dear...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_052<tab>Please <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, watch over my brother's performance!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_052<tab>Please <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, watch over my brother's performance!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_053<tab>Damn you, Beaudefoin....
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_053<tab>Damn you, Beaudefoin....

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_053<tab>...Eh? Ah, it's nothing. Don't concern yourself with my problems, young R'fhul needs all the help he can get.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_053<tab>...Eh? Ah, it's nothing. Don't concern yourself with my problems, young R'fhul needs all the help he can get.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_054<tab>Fhul...I really hope he'll be okay.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_054<tab>Fhul...I really hope he'll be okay.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_055<tab>He'll be fine. My mentor wouldn't make a fool of himself, right...?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_055<tab>He'll be fine. My mentor wouldn't make a fool of himself, right...?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_056<tab>Recently, R'fhul's been... Sorry. Forget I said anything.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_056<tab>Recently, R'fhul's been... Sorry. Forget I said anything.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_060<tab>Do you see my brother? I can't see anything from here...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_060<tab>Do you see my brother? I can't see anything from here...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_061<tab>(-???-)Aha, I sense a damsel in distress! Fear not, young maiden, for we are here to the rescue!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_061<tab>(-???-)Aha, I sense a damsel in distress! Fear not, young maiden, for we are here to the rescue!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_062<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Ahem... Let the games begin! I, Beaudefoin, will humbly serve as main commentator of the proceedings.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_062<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Ahem... Let the games begin! I, Beaudefoin, will humbly serve as main commentator of the proceedings.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_063<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)<sigh> ...And I, Haermaga, will serve as co-commentator.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_063<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)<sigh> ...And I, Haermaga, will serve as co-commentator.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_064<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Together, not even the slighest happening shall escape our glorious commentation!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_064<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Together, not even the slighest happening shall escape our glorious commentation!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_064<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Now then, let us take a look at our first contestant, the up and coming adventurer R'fhul Tia! With such a daunting task before him, who knows what could be running through his mind right now. What do those stern blue eyes of yours see, Haermaga?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_064<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Now then, let us take a look at our first contestant, the up and coming adventurer R'fhul Tia! With such a daunting task before him, who knows what could be running through his mind right now. What do those stern blue eyes of yours see, Haermaga?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_065<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)The lad looks eager to get up and at it, and in terms of physique, he looks to be in fine shape as well. That said, I can't help but notice some nervous energy in him as well.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_065<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)The lad looks eager to get up and at it, and in terms of physique, he looks to be in fine shape as well. That said, I can't help but notice some nervous energy in him as well.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_066<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Thank you for the astute observations, Haermaga. Let's wish him the best of luck outー Ah! The contestant has just took off at a run, and is presently making his way to the first jet of water!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_066<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Thank you for the astute observations, Haermaga. Let's wish him the best of luck outー Ah! The contestant has just took off at a run, and is presently making his way to the first jet of water!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_067<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)And he soars through the sky expertly! Wow, just look at that landing!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_067<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)And he soars through the sky expertly! Wow, just look at that landing!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_068<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)A splendid feat indeed. He managed it all without losing his footing. This is proof of his experience as an adventureーhe's well accustomed to moving under all kinds of circumstances.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_068<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)A splendid feat indeed. He managed it all without losing his footing. This is proof of his experience as an adventureーhe's well accustomed to moving under all kinds of circumstances.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_069<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)And now, he is faced with a decision that will change the course of his fate. Does he take the tried and true path, or try his luck at the new circuit...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_069<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)And now, he is faced with a decision that will change the course of his fate. Does he take the tried and true path, or try his luck at the new circuit...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_069<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)What decision do you think our sprightly contender will make, Haermaga?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_069<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)What decision do you think our sprightly contender will make, Haermaga?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_070<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)The new circuit requires a contestant to have the grit to be calm and collected before the looming barrage of bombs that lie in wait. Unfortunately, I sense much fear in this one. If I were in his shoes, I would pick the old circuit without a second thought, but...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_070<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)The new circuit requires a contestant to have the grit to be calm and collected before the looming barrage of bombs that lie in wait. Unfortunately, I sense much fear in this one. If I were in his shoes, I would pick the old circuit without a second thought, but...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_071<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Ah, he's on the move! It seems he's made his decision: the new circuit! The timing of his movements leave much to be desired, however...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_071<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Ah, he's on the move! It seems he's made his decision: the new circuit! The timing of his movements leave much to be desired, however...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_072<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)Even the slightest moment's hesitation could lead to a messy result, and I fear he teetered for too long... Cover your eyes folks, this could get ugly.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_072<tab>(-Commentator Haermaga-)Even the slightest moment's hesitation could lead to a messy result, and I fear he teetered for too long... Cover your eyes folks, this could get ugly.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_073<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)He managed to dodge the first explosion! And the second, the third, and theーgood Gods, the shockwave of the fourth explosion has sent him flying like a shooting star!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_073<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)He managed to dodge the first explosion! And the second, the third, and theーgood Gods, the shockwave of the fourth explosion has sent him flying like a shooting star!

source:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_073(-実況のボドゥフォアン-)……は無理！
爆風を受けて、空に高々と舞い上がったーーーーッ！
target:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_073(-実況のボドゥフォアン-)……は無理！
爆風を受けて、空に高々と舞い上がったーーーーッ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_074<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Ladies and gentlemen, with saltwater still licking his wounds, I regret to inform you that our contestant has been disqualified!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_074<tab>(-Commentator Beaudefoin-)Ladies and gentlemen, with saltwater still licking his wounds, I regret to inform you that our contestant has been disqualified!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_075<tab>No, no, no, this is bad! This is really, really bad!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_075<tab>No, no, no, this is bad! This is really, really bad!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_076<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Well, the audience has left, so this seems as fine a place as any to end the commentation. Please, go. R'fhul Tia needs your help.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_076<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Well, the audience has left, so this seems as fine a place as any to end the commentation. Please, go. R'fhul Tia needs your help.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_077<tab>(-Haermaga-)Right. I hope you haven't forgotten my request. I'm counting on you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_077<tab>(-Haermaga-)Right. I hope you haven't forgotten my request. I'm counting on you.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_078<tab>Screw Beaudefoin, wily little bastard. Told him hundreds of times I'm not interested in commentating, but he still managed to get his way in the end... Er, mind if I ask what you thought of myーyou know what, nevermind. I don't want to know...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_078<tab>Screw Beaudefoin, wily little bastard. Told him hundreds of times I'm not interested in commentating, but he still managed to get his way in the end... Er, mind if I ask what you thought of myーyou know what, nevermind. I don't want to know...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_079<tab>I leave the matter of R'fhul Tia's rescue in your capable hands!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_079<tab>I leave the matter of R'fhul Tia's rescue in your capable hands!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_100_080<tab>Fhul? Can you hear me?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_100_080<tab>Fhul? Can you hear me?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_100_080<tab>Not like this, R'fhul...not like this.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_100_080<tab>Not like this, R'fhul...not like this.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_100_080<tab>I had my suspicions, but I hoped they wouldn't prove to be true...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_100_080<tab>I had my suspicions, but I hoped they wouldn't prove to be true...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_080<tab>I-I owe you one, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_080<tab>I-I owe you one, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_081<tab>Ah, lest you all misunderstand, I wasn't <var 1A 02 /var>actually<var 1A 01 /var> being serious before. If I really wanted to complete the course, I could've done it with my hands behind my back!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_081<tab>Ah, lest you all misunderstand, I wasn't <var 1A 02 /var>actually<var 1A 01 /var> being serious before. If I really wanted to complete the course, I could've done it with my hands behind my back!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_082<tab>But it'd hardly be entertaining if I just finished it in an instant. There's no drama. Now, when I go back and plow through it, the crowd'll go wild! Genius, eh?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_082<tab>But it'd hardly be entertaining if I just finished it in an instant. There's no drama. Now, when I go back and plow through it, the crowd'll go wild! Genius, eh?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_083<tab>Wait a minute, R'fhul... Is that what you really think? If so, I've lost faith in you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_083<tab>Wait a minute, R'fhul... Is that what you really think? If so, I've lost faith in you.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_084<tab>Oh, uh, erm, I mean... I'm a proper adventurer, so I need to amaze everyone, y'know?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_084<tab>Oh, uh, erm, I mean... I'm a proper adventurer, so I need to amaze everyone, y'know?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_085<tab>No, R'fhul... You're wrong. It's a shame, but this is where we part ways. We misjudged you... Farewell.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_085<tab>No, R'fhul... You're wrong. It's a shame, but this is where we part ways. We misjudged you... Farewell.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_086<tab>Wh-Why... Why is this happening! What did I do wrong?! Tell me! Tell meeeeee!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_086<tab>Wh-Why... Why is this happening! What did I do wrong?! Tell me! Tell meeeeee!
